 2012-02132012-03-01CIC,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS in order to strengthen the integrity of our immigration system by creating a deterrent to relationships of convenience and clarify portions of the existing subsection 130(2) of the Regulations with regards to sponsorship.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2012-0020 Publication Date: 2012-03-14
